xml.name: Delete unused parameters
xml.Text: GoLand can detect parameters in the signature that are not used in the body of a method or a function. As far as they are not used, you can delete them by using the Delete all unused parameters quick-fix.
xml.Try: See the greet method in the editor. The caret is at the first parameter. Press ShowIntentionActions to invoke intention actions.
Select Delete all unused parameters and press EditorEnter. Notice that a usage gets updated accordingly.
